Posts.Content: Hiya, can anyone please tell me if it is possible to have either a TRAM flap or DIEP flap plus implants if you are very small.....any help regarding this would be very much appreciated xx
Posts.Title: Reconstruction.....help please

Posts.Content: Hi everyone,  was just wondering if anybody had any information as to if it is safe to use a vibration plate after having breast cancer and breast reconstruction using implants.  If anyone has any thoughts I would be really grateful to here them please. Thank you in advance
Posts.Title: Vibration Plate

Posts.Content: Hi Crystaljuju Thanks for your thoughts on this matter.  My main concern was that I had read somewhere that it could be dangerous for someone who has had breast cancer to use one as there was a chance it could move things around the body.  I obviously don't want to be putting myself in any danger.  Was wondering if anyone had actually used one or read anything about it. Kind regards
Posts.Title: Vibration Plate

Posts.Content: I know this is probably a bit of along shot but was just wondering if anybody who had completed their Herceptin and taking tamoxifen had done the Clean 9 programme and if it was ok to do so.  Thanks Big hugs to everyone xx
Posts.Title: Clean 9 Nutritional Cleansing Programme
